title: Beautiful Sans Serif for Page Numbers
content: Looking for a sans with beautiful numbers to use for page numbers only. The text face I've chosen is Chronicle Text 1. Thanks for your suggestions!
author: Mario

comments.content: I just posted this somewhere else, and i'm not shilling for House, but i LOVE the numbers in [Neutraface Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20110809061440/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface). Really nice OpenType font set, with alternate numbers and ordinals, etc.
Great suggestion, but it's not quite the vibe I'm going for. If I were to choose something from House, Chalet would be more what I'm looking for.
I should also add that it should obviously look great at small sizes...
There are thousands of typefaces with interesting numerals. Tell us more about the subject matter and audience.
